trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs> 때 작성 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> 발생 시키는 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> 발생는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> 중 하나를 처리 하는 동안 책갈피를 발견 한 경우 이벤트는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 이름 및 이벤트를 트리거한 책갈피의 위치를 가져오려면 액세스는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> 이벤트에 대 한 처리기에서 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a prompt that includes two bookmarks and sends the output to a WAV file for playback.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제는 두 책갈피를 포함 하는 WAV 파일 재생을 위해로 출력을 보내는 프롬프트를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event writes the name of the bookmark and its position in the audio stream when the event was raised to the console.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 처리기는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> 콘솔에 이벤트가 발생 하는 경우 이벤트 이름 책갈피 및 오디오 스트림에서의 위치를 작성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 발생 했을 때 위치에 합성 엔진의 오디오 입력된 스트림을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
